website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re looking for a heavy-duty option for home use or require a robust model for commercial cleaning, this premium mop bucket makes cleaning a breeze.
pros: Generous capacity is ideal for mopping large areas
Ergonomic design features high sides and built-in WaveBreaks to reduce splashing
Down press wringer works beautifully at removing excess water
Caster wheels are smooth, silent, and non-marking
cons: Large footprint requires considerable storage space

customer_reviews.title: Tips Over
customer_reviews.text: When the dirty water container is 3/4 full and the clean water 1/8 full, the bucket tips over backwards with the slightest pressure - e.g. moving by pushing the mop in the bucket, letting the handle rest facing the back, or pushing backward over a concrete floor joint or power cord. Tipped over twice on me. A little experimenting showed that the center of gravity is right over the rear wheels. The wheels need to be placed further back. Poor design!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I redid my entire downstairs in porcelain tile and knew I would be the one that had to clean it. Knowing that I wanted the right equipment for the job. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy duty bucket and mop press
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty bucket and mop press. This style press is way better than the side press. However, this bucket is missing the extra 'lip' on the front which helps when emptying the water out. The 'lip' helps to keep the bucket from sliding down when resting it and tipping it over the side of a sink. Other than that, this item is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: frogperson

customer_reviews.title: So good I ordered a second
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for restaurant use and it is the sturdiest we have had. After spending $75 every other month on the typical "yellow" ones from Sam's this one is far outweighing those. Even purchased a second one for use in back of house and coolers/freezers
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Surls

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: You can tell by the first time you use the down press wringer that it is a quality unit. Even the largest mop head fits properly and wrings out completely. The bucket, with it's unique wave break design is functional and is made with integrity. If you're like me and appreciate the best made things and are willing to pay a little more, then you will want this Rubbermaid Commercial WaveBrake Down Press combo. Well worth the money I spent for it from Amazon and it was shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: TWO BUCKETS ARE AWSOME.
customer_reviews.text: Having two buckets to keep the dirty and clean water separate made a big difference! i love it!
customer_reviews.author: chria

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great to have a sturdy, commercial grade wringer and bucket to the floors with. No more messing with those half-hearted, flimsy mops they sell at the grocery store that you have to wring by hand. This model is larger than I expected. I probably should have gotten a slightly smaller one. It takes up a lot of storage room, but that was my mistake, not the bucket's. Besides, if a job arises where I need the large capacity, I'll be glad I had it!
customer_reviews.author: FrankD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with the dirty water bucket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I would get a dirty water bucket included. It doesn't come with one and trying to find one that fits has been a giant waste of my time. I've order two separate buckets and neither one fits.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: convenient and strong
customer_reviews.text: I've used dozens of mop buckets working in kitchens. This one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: faatman

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: WOW THIS IS VERY STURDY. MY EMPLOYEE DID NOT BREAK THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: EUGENE HEINEMAN

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for a big space
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for a big space. Bought it for use in the basement and garage. Used it at my father-in-laws to clean an attic that had been converted into living space. Much easier than carrying multiple buckets up the steps. Very easy to move up and down the steps.
customer_reviews.author: T Toms

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as the one I use at work.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this was not as heavy as the one I use at work. But would think bc I am not using it for commercial purposes it will be OK. But would not have paid the price I did had I known it would be so light.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline B. Good

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Bucket Available
customer_reviews.text: Best mop bucket available. I love that the mop bucket has a foot pedal to empty the water and you don't have to lift the bucket to dump it. I own a dog boarding kennel and use this bucket day in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy ☺
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this one! Large area's ? No problem ! Very rugged construction ! I'm very happy ☺
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hershorn

customer_reviews.title: Damaged parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mop bucket for my store and when I got it today this is what I found. The handle to the primary bucket is bent and the bucket when the handle goes is split. So I think this is a used item not a new one. I did not return the item as I needed for my store and the back and forth shipping is timely. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: You cannot return these mop buckets. Our handle broke as soon as we used it. Tried to replace and amazon wont replace it! and I'm prime. What a joke. These buckets ar known for the handles breaking as well since, i have done some research on them since purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Works better than others I've tried before
customer_reviews.text: I own a restaurant and we mop the floors 5 times a day. As a result, we go through a lot of mop buckets. What usually happens is the casters break through the plastic on the bucket, or the squeeze mechanism breaks after 3-4 months. This is my second one and the first lasted about a year before the squeeze mechanism broke. The bucket is still fine. These are about the $20 more than similar, lesser products but you get at least 2-3 times the life.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Normal Size for Business
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be huge but it turned out to be normal size which is good. Bucket ONLY 19-20in long 14 high 14in wide Well made.
customer_reviews.author: OKCity

customer_reviews.title: Step on it!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is like all of the WaveBreak models and it has a foot operated bucket drain. Just roll it over a floor drain and step on the pedal. These commercial mop systems are just so much more durable overall why waste your money on junk?
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyPuppy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and strong and stable for all your cleaning needs
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No wheels with package.
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped without casters. It would be nice to have a mop bucket that moves...kind of how the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena Fitch

customer_reviews.title: A very clever design. Huge improvement over old designs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mop wringer and bucket. I bought the old Rubbermaid design over 15 years ago, with the side mount handle. The handle mechanism kept popping out and really didn't do a good job......so if that kept you from considering this newer improved model, then please don't worry! This is a great mop wringer. The design is very clever, and what you would expect from Rubbermaid, the undisputed leader in Janitorial supplies. I highly recommend it, and use it daily in my boat building shop. It keeps the floor clean, and helps clean up spilled water quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product - i use in a small restaurant. it packs a real punch in a relatively small footprint
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K. GORDON

customer_reviews.title: HELP
customer_reviews.text: NO HANDLE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THIRD TIME TRIED TO CONTACT TO RETURN
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Melgoza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mop bucket works great. Worth the price, no need to spend more. The casters roll easily, and the bucket and wringer are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bratpane

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every dollar. Ease of use is great and made solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good commercial mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: Good commercial mop bucket. Downpress wringer does a good job, seems durable. This is hefty bucket and wringer, would not work well for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It did not contain the inner bucket and it was not in the description of the item. The other colors like the gray and black contain the inner bucket. The pictures all look the same and the description between colors does not differ.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sinnona

customer_reviews.title: this is the first one i have had with plastic gears in the wringer but they are holding up just fine. for the money it was a gre
customer_reviews.text: got this about a year and a half ago. use it almost daily in a fast food diner. this is the first one i have had with plastic gears in the wringer but they are holding up just fine. for the money it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: just man

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: I own a commercial cleaning service. The black executive series looks a little more processional. Also after a lot of use it doesn't show as much wear and tear and the standard yellow mop bucket. The quiet wheels are also nice. I will only buy these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T G

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned if this would be of good quality because rubbermaid makes so many products. I just wore out my commercial wringer and mop bucket so I had to replace it. This is just as good and someways even better .You want be sorry you bought it because its going to last a long time with lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Moejoe44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop bucket for a restaurant! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and suits the purpose very well. Will be buying more of these for my small business!!
customer_reviews.author: Howard DuVal

customer_reviews.title: skeh
customer_reviews.text: having used this contraption three times, i've learned that: 1. it is not worth the money 2. no matter what you do, you are still using dirty water. (think about it: when you finish with a mop-pass, you put it back in the clean water. . .you put a dirty mop in clean water. then, you ring it out. but you are still using dirty water to wring your mop when YOU PUT IT BACK IN! DUH!) 3. it is made of pretty good plastic, though. BRAVO Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: walt d****

customer_reviews.title: You still have to rinse the dirty mop in the clean water before you wring it ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of money for little satisfaction. You still have to rinse the dirty mop in the clean water before you wring it out, which makes the entire concept useless.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This bucket leaks from a drain plug on the bottom. Beware...don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wringing basket is very small
customer_reviews.text: I like the high sides but the basket it too small for the intended purpose which was wringing out approximately 2 pounds of alpaca fleece.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ziegler

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial WaveBrake 2.0 35 QT Down-Press Mop Bucket and Wringer, Yellow (FG757788YEL)
product_meta.description: Size:35 Qt| Color:YellowThe Rubbermaid Commercial WaveBrake Mop Bucket with Down Press Wringer Combo Set reduces splashing, for a safer environment, cleaner floors, and improved productivity. The set includes a 35-quart mop bucket with molded-in wave baffles that reduce splashing by up to 40% and a down press mop wringer tested to exceed 50,000 wringing cycles with a tubular steel arm and contoured handle for better grip. The bucket and wringer are made from structural web-molded plastic for a better strength-to-weight ratio than standard injection-molded plastic. This mop bucket with wringer is suitable for commercial and industrial applications. The mop bucket rolls on 4 non-marking casters and has a metal wire handle to facilitate lifting and emptying.
feature_bullets: Large capacity mop bucket for the toughest jobs
Down press wringer tested to exceed 50,000 wringing cycles
Structural web-molded plastic provides better strength-to-weight ratio than standard injection molded plastic
Premium tubular steel handle for durability

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
